font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;Enclosed&#44; please find our onboarding form and MiFID Questionnaire.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;We kindly ask you to fill in the forms and return it to us together with the requested material and your latest audited financials.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;Once received and approved&#44; we will forward to your our standard documentation package for your review.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0cm; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri&#44; sans-serif; color: rgb(32&#44; 31&#44; 30); background-color: rgb(255&#44; 255&#44; 255);&#34;&#34;&gt;&lt;span lang=&#34;&#34;EN-GB&#34;&#34; style=&#34;&#34;margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; font: inherit; vertical-align: baseline; color: inherit;&#34;&#34;&gt;Please be informed that GRM does not conduct business with clients categorised as retail clients under the MiFID regulation. Please see the MiFID Annex in the MiFID questionnaire where you can find additional information on MiFID categorisations.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p class=&#34;&#34;x_MsoNormal&#34;&#34;
